articles.author: ETMarkets.com
articles.title: GIFT Nifty up 60 points; here's the trading setup for today's session - The Economic Times
articles.description: Equity indices closed positively after a volatile week influenced by US Fed. Nifty futures signal a positive start. India VIX fell, Asian and US stocks were mixed. Dow Jones, S&P 500, Nasdaq closed lower.
articles.content: Equity indices witnessed a roller-coaster drive last week before closing in the positive territory, buoyed by a positive commentary from the US Fed. In the truncated trading week, volumes may be lowe… [+3020 chars]
